overview: Florence and the Machine (stylised as Florence + the Machine) perform live at the 2015 Glastonbury Festival. This incredible headlining set features songs off her latest album, How Big, How Blue, How Beautiful, such as “Ship To Wreck” and “What Kind of Man.” Plus plenty of past hits off her 2009 album, Lungs, and her 2011 album, Ceremonials.
title: Florence + The Machine Glastonbury 2015
